str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
Strong (originally and generally of physical strength); mighty, powerful, vehement, sure. From ischus; forcible.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: From peri and ballo; to throw all around, i.e. Invest.
A cloud. From nephos; properly, cloudiness, i.e. a cloud.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A rainbow or halo. Perhaps from ereo; a rainbow.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The sun, sunlight. From hele; the sun; by implication, light.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The foot. A primary word; a 'foot'.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A pillar, support, column. From stuo; a post, i.e. support.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
